CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 因此；因而；从而；所以；这样；那样；如此；以这种方式；以此方法

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。
用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。

bilingual.source: Thus make the world a better place.
bilingual.target: 因此让世界变得更美好。

bilingual.source: My body ached all the time and thus I thought I didn't have much longer to live.
bilingual.target: 我的身体一直疼痛，因此我认为我活不了多久了。

bilingual.source: He was late, thus he missed the meeting.
bilingual.target: 他迟到了，因此错过了会议。

bilingual.source: He didn't study for the exam, thus he failed.
bilingual.target: 他没有为考试学习，因此他失败了。

bilingual.source: The weather was terrible, thus we stayed indoors.
bilingual.target: 天气很糟糕，因此我们待在室内。

bilingual.source: The project was poorly managed, thus it was delayed.
bilingual.target: 项目管理不善，因此被延迟了。

bilingual.source: The sample size was too small and thus unrepresentative.
bilingual.target: 样本量太小，因此是不具代表性的。

bilingual.source: She forgot her umbrella, thus she got wet in the rain.
bilingual.target: 她忘了带伞，因此在雨中淋湿了。

bilingual.source: This word does not have a common usage in English, and thus no example sentences can be provided.
bilingual.target: 这个词条在英语中没有常用释义，因此无法提供例句。

list.abstract: thus（英 [ðʌs]，美 [ðʌs]），英语单词，作副词为因此；从而；如此。例句：It is too inclusive and thus lacks clarity.（它过于包罗万象，因此缺乏清晰度。） thus的近义词有therefore，so，consequently等。

yingyinNormal.en: Then score the loaf, which allows you to control the direction in which the loaf expands, or blooms, in the oven. Thus the name bloomer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后用刀子在面包上划几刀，这会让你控制面包在烤箱中膨胀的方向，因此才得名。

yingyinNormal.en: I have never been thus treated in my entire life!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一辈子都没有被这样对待过！

yingyinNormal.en: Might I ask why with so little endeavor at civility I am thus repulsed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能否问你为什么我竟会遭受如此无礼的拒绝？

yingyinNormal.en: Thus, time must tick at different rates for people moving relative to each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以 当人们对他人相对地移动时，时间一定以不一样的速率流逝。

yingyinNormal.en: The algae have thus become the driving force of the construction, aiming to occupy the best place in the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 藻类也成为珊瑚生长的推动力，孜孜不倦地抢占着阳光最强的位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Heaven and Earth! Are the shades of Pemberley to be thus polluted? Now tell me once and for all, are you engaged to him? I am not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的上帝啊！难道我们彭布利已经被你们这些人玷污了么？爽爽快快告诉我你究竟跟她订婚了没有？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Have you considered improving your socialization skills, thus allowing you to communicate more effectively with other people?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你有没有考虑过提高你的社交技能呢，好让你更有效地和别人交流？

yingyinNormal.en: The point is, your generation is charged with this task of breaking through what the body politic has thus far made impervious to change.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关键在于：你们这一代人肩负着打破国家目前改革维艰的局面。

yingyinNormal.en: With Dungeons & Dragons dice? Yes. From here on in, I've decided to make all trivial decisions with a throw of the dice, thus freeing up my mind do what it does best enlighten and amaze.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用《龙与地下城》的骰子吗？是的，从这刻起，我决定，以后不重要的决定都通过掷骰子决定，这样可以为我的头脑腾出时间，做它最擅长的事儿：启迪思维，震惊世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if Amy's too busy, that gives the rest of you an opportunity to make my life easier, thus assuring yourselves a footnote in my memoirs, tentatively entitled You're Welcome, Mankind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然艾米太忙，就给你们一个让我生活更轻松的机会吧，我保证带我去的人能在我那本暂命名为《不客气，凡夫俗子》的回忆录里留一个注脚。

yingyinNormal.en: But, you're suggesting that I have emotional issues below my consciousness which drive my behavior, thus causing me to lash out at anything or anyone that threatens my intellectual superiority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你是在暗示潜意识里我的情绪影响了我的行动，导致我大肆打击任何威胁到我智商优势的人或事吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Since their relationship become carnal, Penny has upgraded his designated term of endearment, thus distinguishing him from those she calls "sweetie," usually in an attempt to soften a thinly veiled insult.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，自从他们发展至肉体关系，佩妮就升级了对他的爱称，跟她称为“甜心”的人区分，通常为了略微消减隐含的讽刺之意。

yingyinNormal.en: And the only reason the coins in the funnels (or satellites around the earth) eventually DO spiral in to their doom is because they lose energy to friction and thus shift down from one stable orbit to another, until eventually, their orbit coincides with the ground. Which is called crashing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且，这些漏斗中的钱币（或者类似地球周围的人造卫星），最终将进入"螺旋宿命"的唯一原因就是由于摩擦力造成动能损失，不断地从一个稳定的轨道移转到另一个趋向中心的轨道，最终，它们的轨道与中心相互重迭，然后发生也就是我们所谓的"坠毁"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: because of this or that; as a result of something just mentioned

examination_example.sentence: In addition, new digital technologies have allowed more rapid trading of equities, and <highlight>thus</highlight> shorter attention spans in financial markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，新的数字技术已使得股票交易更加迅速，并且因此缩短了金融市场的关注时间。

examination_example.sentence: Graduates don't know the content and character of liberal education and are <highlight>thus</highlight> deprived of its benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕业生不知道博雅教育的内容和特点，因此被剥夺了它的好处。

examination_example.sentence: Arizona had <highlight>thus</highlight> intruded on the federal's privileged powers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚利桑那州因此侵犯了联邦的特权。

sense_info_list.en: in the manner now being indicated or exemplified; in this way

examination_example.sentence: The challenge the computer mounts to television <highlight>thus</highlight> bears little similarity to one format being replaced by another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电脑成为了电视的挑战者，这与那种一物更替另一物的情况不同。

word_usage.usage:
thus在句中用作状语，常修饰整个句子，可用在句首、句中或句末，也可用在系动词（如：be动词）或助动词（如：has/do）的后面，如：
Thus the question was finally settled. 这样问题终于解决了。
They have thus placed themselves in opposition to the people. 因此，他们把自己置于人民的对立面。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: because of this or that; as a result of something just mentioned

examination_example.sentence: We often feel stuck in a rut (常规) if we wear the same clothes—<highlight>thus</highlight> adding something different to an outfit can positively shift your mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们穿着相同的衣服，我们经常会感到陷入常规之中——因此为衣服添加一些不同的东西可以积极地改变你的心情。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>, body weight is not always the best indicator of health and a thin person still needs to eat well and exercise regularly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，体重并非始终是健康的最佳指标，而瘦弱的人仍然需要吃得好并且经常运动。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists become more organized and better disciplined themselves, <highlight>thus</highlight> avoiding confusion later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们变得更有条理，也更加自律，从而避免了以后的混乱。

sense_info_list.en: in the manner now being indicated or exemplified; in this way

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: because of this or that; as a result of something just mentioned

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>, they claim it is too early to call computer game addiction a disorder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，他们声称将电脑游戏成瘾称为一种疾病还为时过早。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>, rising microwave sales could be seen as a positive thing
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，微波炉销量攀升可视为一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: This means that some wells may even need to undergo desalination after extraction, <highlight>thus</highlight> increasing the cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着一些井甚至可能需要在提取后进行脱盐，从而增加了成本。

sense_info_list.en: in the manner now being indicated or exemplified; in this way

examination_example.sentence: The unpaid nature of domestic work reinforces the assumption that "housework is not work, <highlight>thus</highlight> preventing women from struggling against it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家务劳动的无报酬性质强化了“家务劳动不是工作，因此阻止了女性与之抗争”的假设。

examination_example.sentence: He tells me it has saved him over $ 500 <highlight>thus</highlight> far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他告诉我，到目前为止，这为他节省了500多美元。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: because of this or that; as a result of something just mentioned

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>, it may be worth bringing up issues with your friends, family members, or classmates rather than holding them back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，与其阻止他们，向你的朋友、家人及同学提出问题会很有价值。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>,the keyboard can determine people's identities, and by extension, whether they should be given access to the computer it's connected to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，该智能键盘可以确定人们的身份，来进一步决定是否允许他们访问其所连接的计算机。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: because of this or that; as a result of something just mentioned

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Thus</highlight>, after one day, two days, one month, two months... he always kept putting the wild flower seeds along the roadside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于是，过了一天、两天、一个月、两个月……他总是把野花的种子放在路边。

examination_example.sentence: Heavy and spicy foods may give you heartburn or other digestive problems, <highlight>thus</highlight> influencing your ability to get and stay asleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 难以消化的和辛辣的食物可能会让你有烧心或其他消化系统问题，因此影响你的入睡能力。

examination_example.sentence: The radio telescope <highlight>thus</highlight> appeared, and it is considered one of the greatest inventions in the twentieth century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于是，射电望远镜就这样出现了，它被认为是二十世纪最伟大的发明之一。
